text: President Sirisena expressed his condolences to the family of Late Former Minister.Minister Nimal Siripala De Silva and Lasantha Alagiyawanna also participated.President Maithripala Sirisena paid his last respects to late Former Minister A.H.M.Azwer at his residence in Colombo. President Sirisena expressed his condolences to the family of Late Former Minister.Minister Nimal Siripala De Silva and Lasantha Alagiyawanna also participated.
title: President pays last respects
